aka: A Season in the Life of Emmanuel

cast.name: 加曼恩·蒙特洛 Germaine Montero
弗洛伦斯·焦尔杰蒂 Florence Giorgetti
凯瑟琳·布雷亚 Catherine Breillat

this_title: Une saison dans la vie d'Emmanuel
trans_title: A Season in the Life of Emmanuel
introduction: A Season in the Life of Emmanuel, Marie-Claire Blais' novel adaptation, a newborn who witnesses the drastic changes a French family experiences in a brief period of time. One of the Emmanuel brothers, Jean le Maigre, is not like the others. Skinny thirteen years old, disobedient, rebellious, he seems doomed to a different fate. It is through this boy, as marked by the shadow of Rimbaud, the world explodes.
foreign_title: Une saison dans la vie d'Emmanuel
